channel.title: Fernando Rayón Viña
channel.description:
I will try to post here on topics that interest me, especially those related to what I'm doing.
They will be in both English and Spanish.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Fernando Rayón Viña
item.description:
Puedes encontrar este post en español aquí

print("Hello World!")
[1] "Hello World!"

Well, as I have already mentioned above, this is just a first welcome post. I have built this web using Posit (RStudio) Quarto (in R obviously) almost as an experiment, using only Rstudio Desktop, some time and a lot of patience.
I have to thank Silvia Canelón for leaving her github repository with the source code of her magnificent web open so that the rest of us can copy inspire from her to make our own.

I doubt that I will post regularly, because I have never done it, but I will try to post here curiosities that I am working with and that I consider worthwhile. What I do have quite clear is that I will continue making changes and improvements to this web.

← Back to the blog

Back to top
